explanation: To complete the task of placing the pen from the desk to the circle table, the following steps can be taken: 1. Pick up the pen from the desk. 2. Walk over to the circle table. 3. Place the pen on the circle table. To complete the task of putting the pen from the desk to the side table, the following steps can be taken: 1. Pick up the pen from the desk. 2. Walk over to the side table. 3. Place the pen on the side table.
